thread.title: Huawei's P10 Plus might have more RAM than your laptop
thread.title_full: Huawei's P10 Plus might have more RAM than your laptop

author: Erna Mahyuni
title: Huawei's P10 Plus might have more RAM than your laptop
text:
Huawei's P10 Plus might have more RAM than your laptop 6GB on the V9 not enough? The P10 Plus might be what you need 14 February 2017 / 12:56SGT 
Huawei's looking to make a big splash at the Mobile World Congress, with not just the V9 but likely the P10, P10 Plus as well as a new watch. Huawei gunning for spotlight 
So far, one listing has come out on a Spanish website: retailer Phone House, that shows some pretty interesting specs for the P10 Plus. The P10 Plus is listed as having a 5.5in display with Quad HD resolution, a Kirin 960 processor, 12MP rear camera, 3.5mm headphone jack, 256GB internal storage. 
But most interesting is the 8GB of RAM - that's more than some people have on their laptops. The listing also says the device will cost â‚¬799 (S$1200), with colour choices of black, white and gold. 
We're guessing the Huawei P10 will come with a smaller form factor and similar internals, though perhaps a little less RAM. Besides the P10, P10 Plus and V9, Huawei will also be featuring its latest smartwatch. 
Huawei's CEO Richard Yu posted a teaser of what's to come in Huawei's smartwatch plans on his Weibo, formally outing the name of the new watch as Huawei Watch 2. You can't see the watch clearly in the photo but it's obvious we'll have a new Huawei smartwatch to look forward to. 
Exciting stuff indeed. In the meantime check out our review of Huawei's popular P9 phone.
